name: DOCUSIGN__CREATE_ENVELOPE
description: Create a new envelope with documents and recipients for electronic signature collection.

emailSubject.description: Subject line for the signature request email

emailMessage.description: Message body for the signature request email

documents.description: Array of documents to include in the envelope

routingOrder.description: Order in which recipient should sign

signers.description: Array of signers for the envelope

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_ENVELOPE_STATUS
description: Retrieve the current status and details of an envelope including recipient information and document status.

name: DOCUSIGN__LIST_ENVELOPES
description: Retrieve a list of envelopes for the account with filtering options by status, date, and other criteria.

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_ENVELOPE_RECIPIENTS
description: Retrieve information about all recipients of an envelope including their signature status and details.

name: DOCUSIGN__ADD_RECIPIENT
description: Add one or more recipients to an existing envelope for signature collection.

routingOrder.description: Order in which recipient should sign

signers.description: Array of signers to add to the envelope

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_DOCUMENT
description: Download a document from a completed envelope, useful for retrieving signed documents.

name: DOCUSIGN__CREATE_TEMPLATE
description: Create a reusable template with predefined documents, recipients, and signature fields for streamlined envelope creation.

emailSubject.description: Default email subject for envelopes created from this template

documents.description: Array of documents to include in the template

name: DOCUSIGN__LIST_TEMPLATES
description: Retrieve a list of all templates available in the account for creating envelopes.

name: DOCUSIGN__CREATE_ENVELOPE_FROM_TEMPLATE
description: Create an envelope using an existing template, allowing for quick document creation with predefined settings.

templateId.description: ID of the template to use

roleName.description: Role name as defined in the template

emailSubject.description: Override the template's default email subject

name: DOCUSIGN__VOID_ENVELOPE
description: Void an envelope to cancel the signature process and prevent further action on the documents.

envelope_id.description: Unique identifier for the envelope to void

status.description: Status to set the envelope to

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_TEMPLATE
description: Get detailed information about a specific DocuSign template including documents, recipients, and signature fields configuration.

name: DOCUSIGN__UPDATE_TEMPLATE
description: Update an existing DocuSign template properties such as name, description, and email subject.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the template to update

name: DOCUSIGN__DELETE_TEMPLATE
description: Delete a DocuSign template. This permanently removes the template from the account.

template_id.description: Unique identifier for the template to delete

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_ACCOUNT_INFO
description: Get information about the DocuSign account including plan details, settings, and capabilities.

name: DOCUSIGN__LIST_FOLDERS
description: List folders in the DocuSign account for organizing envelopes and templates. This helps with document management and organization.

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_FOLDER_ITEMS
description: Get envelopes and items within a specific DocuSign folder. This allows browsing organized document collections.

name: DOCUSIGN__SEND_REMINDER
description: Send a reminder email to recipients who have not yet completed their action on an envelope.

expireWarn.description: Days before expiration to send warning

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_ENVELOPE_AUDIT_EVENTS
description: Get audit events and timeline for an envelope showing all actions taken on the document including signatures, views, and status changes.

name: DOCUSIGN__UPDATE_RECIPIENT
description: Update recipient information for an envelope including email, name, and routing order before the envelope is completed.

name: DOCUSIGN__RESEND_ENVELOPE
description: Resend an envelope to recipients who have not completed their signing action. This helps ensure document completion.

envelope_id.description: Unique identifier for the envelope to resend

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_ENVELOPE_DOCUMENTS
description: List all documents within an envelope including document IDs, names, and types for download or management purposes.

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_SIGNING_URL
description: Generate an embedded signing URL for a recipient to sign documents within your application instead of via email.

recipientId.description: ID of the recipient who will sign

returnUrl.description: URL to redirect to after signing is complete

authenticationMethod.description: Authentication method for the signing session

name: DOCUSIGN__DOWNLOAD_COMBINED_DOCUMENT
description: Download all documents from an envelope as a single combined PDF file. This provides a complete signed document package.

certificate.description: Include completion certificate in combined document

name: DOCUSIGN__CREATE_WEBHOOK
description: Create a Connect webhook configuration to receive real-time notifications about envelope status changes and events.

urlToPublishTo.description: Webhook endpoint URL to receive notifications

includeDocumentFields.description: Include document field data in notifications

includeSenderAccountasCustomField.description: Include sender account as custom field

includeData.description: Additional data to include in webhook events

name: DOCUSIGN__LIST_WEBHOOKS
description: List all Connect webhook configurations for the account to manage notification settings and endpoints.

name: DOCUSIGN__UPDATE_WEBHOOK
description: Update an existing Connect webhook configuration including URL, settings, and event data preferences.

connect_id.description: Unique identifier for the Connect configuration

name.description: Updated name for the webhook configuration

name: DOCUSIGN__DELETE_WEBHOOK
description: Delete a Connect webhook configuration to stop receiving notifications from DocuSign.

connect_id.description: Unique identifier for the Connect configuration to delete

name: DOCUSIGN__GET_BRAND
description: Get branding information for customizing the signing experience including logos, colors, and messaging.

name: DOCUSIGN__LIST_BRANDS
description: List all available brands for the account to manage signing experience customization and corporate branding.
